title: Information and Learning in Economic Theory. (arXiv:2212.07521v2 [econ.TH] UPDATED)
abstract: These lecture notes accompany a one-semester graduate course on information and learning in economic theory. Topics include common knowledge, Bayesian updating, monotone-likelihood ratio properties, affiliation, the Blackwell order, cost of information, learning and merging of beliefs, model uncertainty, model misspecification, and information design.

translated_title: 经济学中的信息和学习理论
translated_abstract: 这篇论文陪伴一门关于经济学中信息和学习理论的研究生课程，主要内容包括共知、贝叶斯更新、单调似然比性质、隶属关系、布莱克韦尔排序、信息成本、信念的学习和合并、模型不确定性、模型错误和信息设计。
tldr: 这篇论文介绍了经济学中关于信息和学习的一些重要理论课题，包括如何进行贝叶斯更新、学习和合并信念、如何处理模型不确定性和错误等。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces some important theoretical topics about information and learning in economics, including Bayesian updating, learning and merging of beliefs, model uncertainty and misspecification, etc.
